concept.title: Verifying interface IP addresses after restoring an appliance
concept.shortdesc: After you restore an appliance by using a backup and specifying Appliance=False, it is possible that the network interface IP addresses of the appliance have changed since the backup was created. In this situation, you must amend these network interface IP addresses.

conbody.p:
In the time between creating a backup of your appliance and restoring, it is possible for the network interface IP addresses of the following configuration items to have changed:
Endpoints
Web UI host
SNMP agent If the IP addresses have changed since the creation of the backup, you must amend them so that the appliance can operate correctly.
